title: 谁来告诉我这段指令出了什么问题
author: moses-minecraft

replies.author: 爱心魔王FHC
replies.txt_content:
指令是这样的

give @p iron_sword 1 0 {AttributeModifiers:[{Operation:0,UUIDLeast:1,UUIDMost:1,Amount:5.5,AttributeName:generic.attackDamage,Name:Attack},{Operation:0,UUIDLeast:2,UUIDMost:2,Amount: 5.5.0,AttributeName:generic.knockbackResistance,Name:Knockback},{Operation:0,UUIDLeast:3,UUIDMost:3,Amount:1.0,AttributeName:generic.followRange,Name:Follow},{Operation:0,UUIDLeast:4,UUIDMost:4,Amount:0.0,AttributeName:generic.maxHealth,Name:Health},{Operation:0,UUIDLeast:5,UUIDMost:5,Amount:0.05,AttributeName:generic.movementSpeed,Name:Speed}],display:{Name:"BlackNight"}}复制代码

End你的括号放错位置了……

replies.author: End-Enderman
replies.txt_content: 请把指令修改为give @p iron_sword 1 0 {AttributeModifiers:[{Operation:0,UUIDLeast:1,UUIDMost:1,Amount:5.5,AttributeName:generic.attackDamage,Name:Attack},{Operation:0,UUIDLeast:2,UUIDMost:2,Amount: 5.5.0,AttributeName:generic.knockbackResistance,Name:Knockback},{Operation:0,UUIDLeast:3,UUIDMost:3,Amount:1.0,AttributeName:generic.followRange,Name:Follow},{Operation:0,UUIDLeast:4,UUIDMost:4,Amount:0.0,AttributeName:generic.maxHealth,Name:Health},{Operation:0,UUIDLeast:5,UUIDMost:5,Amount:0.05,AttributeName:generic.movementSpeed,Name:Speed},display:{Name:"BlackNight"}]}复制代码只要开头有括号，display不需要再重新引用

replies.author: moses-minecraft
replies.txt_content:
End-Enderman 发表于 2015-5-3 11:55
请把指令修改为 只要开头有括号，display不需要再重新引用
为什么我的剑还是没名字

replies.author: End-Enderman
replies.txt_content:
moses-minecraft 发表于 2015-5-3 12:14
为什么我的剑还是没名字
额，刚看见被选最佳了，抱歉，括号放错了
